General.Name: Liuzhou Liangmianzhen Co Ltd
General.Description: Liuzhou Liangmianzhen Co., Ltd. produces and sells personal toiletries, hotel daily necessities, and oral care and pharmaceutical products in China and internationally. It offers toothpaste, shampoo, shower gel, conditioner, body lotion, soap, hand sanitizer, detergent, fragrance, oral cleaning, toothbrush, hair comb, shoe brush, hotel disposable, travel, household hygiene, plastic, and rubber products, as well as cosmetics, daily use chemicals, and packaging supplies. The company also engages in the processing and sale of paper products; food business; and production and sale of slippers, hats, creams, and clothing and bedding products. In addition, it offers medical products, such as APIs, tablets, hard capsules, granules, syrups, oral solutions, ointments, and psychotropic drugs. Additionally, the company develops real estate properties. Liuzhou Liangmianzhen Co., Ltd. was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Liuzhou, China.
